Class.name: Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.SCTTSingleReport
Class.Description: Report Name: SCTT Report Report Code: AUXX.SCTT0001 TRC Number: 152012

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data:
<report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.SCTTReport' queryName='Main' name='Main'> <parameter expression='..EpisodeID'/> <parameter expression='..ReferralID'/> <parameter expression='..UserID'/> <parameter expression='..WINRowId'/> <parameter expression='..ID'/> <parameter expression='..ReferralToID'/> <parameter expression='..PatientID'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/> <group name="SCTTMain" breakOnField="FooterCode" runonce="true"> <attribute name='PrintDate' expression='" Date: dd/mm/yyyy "_$zd(+$h, 4, 4)'/> <attribute field='Agency' name='Agency' expression='" Position/Agency: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Contact' name='Contact' expression='" Contact Number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Name' name='Name' expression='" Name: "_%val'/> <attribute field='ClientName' name='ClientName' expression='" Name: "_%val'/> <attribute field='DOB' name='DOB' expression='" Date of Birth: dd/mm/yyyy "_%val'/> <attribute field='Sex' name='Sex' expression='" Sex: "_%val'/> <attribute field='UR' name='UR' expression='" UR Number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='FooterCode' name='FooterCode' expression='..IncludeGroup(%val)'/> <element field='PageTitle' name='PageTitle'/> <element field='PageDesc' name='PageDesc'/> <attribute field='PageSideText' name='PageSideText'/>
<group name="ConInfo" queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.SCTTConsumerInformation' queryName='ConInfo' ifexpression='..Code=""CI""'> <parameter expression='..EpisodeID'/> <parameter expression='..PatientID'/>
<group name='ConInfoDetails'> <element field='FormCode' name='FormCode'/> <element field='PageSideText' name='PageSideText'/> <element field='PageTitle' name='PageTitle'/> <element field='PageDesc' name='PageDesc'/> <attribute fields='Surname,GivenName' name='ClientName' expression='" Name: "_%val("Surname")_", "_%val("GivenName")'/> <attribute field='DOB' name='CaptionDOB' expression='" Date of Birth: dd/mm/yyyy "_%val'/> <attribute field='SexDesc' name='CaptionSex' expression='" Sex: "_%val'/> <attribute field='UR' name='CaptionUR' expression='" UR Number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Surname' name='Surname'/> <attribute fields='GivenName,SecondName' name='GivenName' expression='%val("GivenName")_" "_%val("SecondName")'/> <attribute field='SecondName' name='SecondName'/> <attribute field='DOB' name='DOB' expression='" dd/mm/yyyy "_%val'/> <attribute field='EstDOB' name='EstDOB'/> <attribute field='EstDOBDesc' name='EstDOBDesc'/> <attribute field='PrefName' name='PrefName'/> <attribute field='Sex' name='Sex'/> <attribute field='SexDesc' name='SexDesc'/> <attribute field='Title' name='Title'/> <element field='HomeAddress' name='HomeAddress'/> <element field='PostalAddress' name='PostalAddress'/> <attribute field='HomePhone' name='HomePhone' expression='" Home: "_%val'/> <attribute field='WorkPhone' name='WorkPhone' expression='" Work: "_%val'/> <attribute field='MobilePhone' name='MobilePhone' expression='" Mobile: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Email' name='Email' expression='" Email: "_%val'/> <attribute field='PrefContact' name='PrefContact'/> <attribute field='HomeMsg' name='HomeMsg'/> <attribute field='WorkMsg' name='WorkMsg'/> <attribute field='MobileMsg' name='MobileMsg'/> <attribute field='EmailMsg' name='EmailMsg'/>
<attribute field='CountryBirth' name='CountryBirth'/> <attribute field='IndigStatus' name='IndigStatus'/> <attribute field='InterReq' name='InterReq'/> <attribute field='PrefLang' name='PrefLang'/> <attribute field='CommNeeds' name='CommNeeds'/>
<attribute field='CountryBirthCode' name='CountryBirthCode'/> <attribute field='IndigStatusCode' name='IndigStatusCode'/> <attribute field='InterReqCode' name='InterReqCode'/> <attribute field='PrefLangCode' name='PrefLangCode'/> <attribute field='CommNeedsCode' name='CommNeedsCode'/>
<attribute field='RefName' name='RefName'/> <attribute field='RefDoctor' name='RefDoctor'/> <attribute field='RefPhone' name='RefPhone'/> <attribute field='RefFax' name='RefFax'/> <attribute field='RefEmail' name='RefEmail'/> <element field='RefAddress' name='RefAddress'/>
<attribute field='NokName1' name='NokName1'/> <element field='NOKAddress1' name='NOKAddress1'/> <attribute field='NokHomePhone1' name='NokHomePhone1' expression='" Home: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokWorkPhone1' name='NokWorkPhone1' expression='" Work: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokMobilePhone1' name='NokMobilePhone1' expression='" Mobile: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokRelation1' name='NokRelation1'/> <attribute field='NokRelationCode1' name='NokRelationCode1'/> <attribute field='CarerY1' name='CarerY1'/> <attribute field='LegalY1' name='LegalY1'/>
<attribute field='NokName2' name='NokName2'/> <element field='NOKAddress2' name='NOKAddress2'/> <attribute field='NokHomePhone2' name='NokHomePhone2' expression='" Home: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokWorkPhone2' name='NokWorkPhone2' expression='" Work: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokMobilePhone2' name='NokMobilePhone2' expression='" Mobile: "_%val'/> <attribute field='NokRelation2' name='NokRelation2'/> <attribute field='NokRelationCode2' name='NokRelationCode2'/> <attribute field='CarerY2' name='CarerY2'/> <attribute field='LegalY2' name='LegalY2'/>
<attribute field='LegalStatus' name='LegalStatus'/> <attribute field='PensionType' name='PensionType'/> <attribute field='ConsStatus' name='ConsStatus'/> <attribute field='GovCardNo' name='GovCardNo' expression='" Card number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Medicare' name='Medicare' expression='" Card number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='Payor' name='Payor' expression='" Insurer name: "_%val'/> <attribute field='PayorNo' name='PayorNo' expression='" Card number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='DVACardType' name='DVACardType' expression='" DVA card type: "_%val'/> <attribute field='DVANo' name='DVANo' expression='" DVA card number: "_%val'/> <attribute field='CompType' name='CompType'/> <element field='Comments' name='Comments'/>
<attribute field='LegalStatusCode' name='LegalStatusCode'/> <attribute field='PensionTypeCode' name='PensionTypeCode'/> <attribute field='DVACardTypeCode' name='DVACardTypeCode'/> <attribute field='CompTypeCode' name='CompTypeCode'/>
</group> </group>
<group name="CCP1" queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.SCTTCareCorordPlan' queryName='CCP' ifexpression='..Code=""CCP1""'> <parameter expression='..EpisodeID'/> <parameter expression='..ReferralID'/> <parameter expression='"Page1"'/> <parameter expression='..ID'/>
